backend/main.mo: Main canister defining user roles, lessons, vocabulary, ayahs, quizzes, access control, and storage structures with permission helpers and stable types.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented rich‑text editor features, related files, components, and test mappings.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files describing their purpose, behavior, and UI functionality.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point configuring PWA meta tags, icons, manifest, and mounting the React app.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining app metadata, icons, orientation support, and display settings.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing static asset caching with install, activate, and fetch strategies.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling authentication flow, profile setup, service worker registration, and layout rendering.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header component showing logo, user avatar, and dropdown menu for profile, settings, and logout actions.
frontend/src/components/MainLayout.tsx: Manages main app navigation by switching between pages like lessons, quizzes, notes, and whiteboard, including handling IDs for editing or viewing items.
frontend/src/components/NoteDialog.tsx: Displays and manages notes for a specific item, supporting creation, editing, and deletion within a dialog UI.
frontend/src/components/ProfileDialog.ts: Allows users to view and update their profile information, including name and avatar upload.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Prompts new users to enter their name to create an initial profile.
frontend/src/components/PWAInstallDialog: Shows a popup prompting users to install the PWA, handling install events, dismissal, and installation state.
frontend/src/components/RichTextEditor.t: Provides a Quill-based rich text editor with basic formatting controls and placeholder support.
frontend/src/components/SettingsDialog.t: Displays application settings including theme toggle and, for admins, an option to reset app data with confirmation.
frontend/src/components/WordFormWithTool: Displays a badge that toggles a tooltip showing a word’s meaning when clicked, with click-outside handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and helpers for managing Internet Identity login, stored identity loading, and auth client setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, lessons, words, ayahs, and permissions via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus custom theme variables and rich text editor styling for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/EditLessonPage.tsx: Page for editing a lesson’s title, content, and visibility with validation and update mutation handling.
frontend/src/pages/LessonsPage.tsx: Displays all lessons with controls for viewing, editing, deleting, toggling active state, and managing visibility depending on user permissions.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Provides an Internet Identity login screen with branding and a single login action.
frontend/src/pages/NewLessonPage.tsx: Form for creating a lesson with rich text content, visibility settings, and management of words and ayahs.
frontend/src/pages/NewQuizPage.tsx: Allows creation of a new quiz by entering a title and selecting a quiz type.
frontend/src/pages/NotesPage.tsx: Displays the user's saved notes and provides deletion and basic note metadata display.
frontend/src/pages/QuizPage.tsx: Lists quizzes with options to create, delete, or start a quiz based on permissions.
frontend/src/pages/TakeQuizPage.tsx: Implements quiz-taking UI supporting flashcard and multiple-choice modes, manages question flow, answers, and results display.
frontend/src/pages/ViewLessonPage.tsx: Displays a lesson with expandable rich-text content and vocabulary/ayah lists using accordions.
frontend/src/pages/VocabularyPage.tsx: Shows all vocabulary across lessons with sorting, reveal toggles, admin deletion, and a details dialog.
frontend/src/pages/WhiteboardPage.tsx: Shows the active lesson with expandable content, vocabulary, ayahs, and allows adding notes to items.
frontend/src/utils/richText.ts: Provides helpers for checking, sanitizing, parsing, and previewing rich-text HTML content.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session-stored values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, animations, container settings, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s state, including existing features, new feature requests, metadata, and versioning for a rich‑text editor update.
